definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: Luxun had deep love for artistic works all his life, especially in woodcut of block print.
sentences.chinese: 鲁迅先生一生热爱美术作品，对版画中木刻兴趣尤甚。

sentences.english: He collected an old engraving of London Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他收藏了一张古老的伦敦桥版画。

sentences.english: There are many methods of printmaking.
sentences.chinese: 制作版画的方法有很多种。

sentences.english: Printmaking is the process of making artworks by printing, normally on paper.
sentences.chinese: 版画是制作过程艺术品印刷，通常是纸上谈兵。

sentences.english: I got to knowthewhole process of making a etching today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天了解到了制作一幅铜版画的全过程。

sentences.english: He feasted his eyes on those beautiful engravings.
sentences.chinese: 他尽管地欣赏着那些优美的版画。

sentences.english: I ran upon this old print in the antique shop.
sentences.chinese: 我在那古玩店里意外地发现了这张老版画。

sentences.english: These etchings form the paths that electricity follows in the chip.
sentences.chinese: 这些蚀刻版画形成路径电在薄片中跟随。

sentences.english: In recent years, however, the artist has broadened his formal reach to include print-making as well as figurative sculpture.
sentences.chinese: 但是，最近几年他把领域拓宽到包括版画和雕塑上。

sentences.english: The print artists have been invited to display their works in the European country.
sentences.chinese: 版画家受到邀请前往这个欧洲国家展示他们的作品。

sentences.english: The Wayfarer Rare Prints is a must have for any collector or enthusiast.
sentences.chinese: 该旅行者珍稀版画是一个必须有任何收藏家或爱好者。

sentences.english: Learn wooden spoon techniques with expertise from a printmaker in this free printmaking video.
sentences.chinese: 学习与专业知识木勺从版画版画技术在此免费视频。

sentences.english: Learn wooden spoon techniques with expertise from a printmaker in this free printmaking video.
sentences.chinese: 学习与专业知识木勺从版画版画技术在此免费视频。

sentences.english: Traditional printing of woodcut developed its flouring at Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 传统版画在明代发展到了鼎盛时期。

sentences.english: Cleaning the wood in relief printmaking will make carving easier.
sentences.chinese: 清洁救济会雕刻木版画更容易。

sentences.english: Printmaking , is also an important Chinese art classes.
sentences.chinese: 版画，也是中国美术的一个重要门类。

definition: gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
